cast.name: 叶夫根尼娅·冬妮娜 Evgenia Dodina
弗拉基米尔·弗里德曼 Vladimir Friedman

writer.name: 凯伦·本·拉斐尔 Keren Ben Rafael
埃利斯·本鲁比 Élise Benroubi

director.name: 凯伦·本·拉斐尔 Keren Ben Rafael

introduction: Teenage Lana whiles away the hours in her hometown Kiryat Yam, a run-down beachside community on Israel’s Mediterranean coast. She hangs out with a trio of shiftless boys, keeps an eye on her precocious cousin Tamar, and dreams up an impending move to Tel Aviv, all while waiting for the moment when her mother’s café finally bankrupts her family. But the sudden arrival of an attractive writer, Tchipi, may present solution for both boredom and bottom lines: He spins a local myth into a news report of a mermaid sighting offshore—bringing people back to the city’s beaches. Now, the locals just need to turn this mermaid mania into an event big enough to bring hope and excitement back into their lives. (Tribeca 2018)
